key takeaway for quick navigation introduction to artificial intelligence artificial intelligence defined a the ability of artificial device like computer to perform task typically requiring human intelligence overview of the evolving definition and capability of ai including it historical progression and current application type of artificial intelligence classification of ai task into category such a calculation memory learning creativity and selfawareness discussion on the challenge in replicating humanlike intelligence in machine creativity in artificial intelligence exploration of algorithm and technique enabling ai to exhibit creativity in various domain such a painting music writing and humor example of aigenerated creative output and ongoing research in enhancing ai creative capability machine learning and ai explanation of machine learning ml a subset of ai focusing on the ability of algorithm to learn from data and improve performance over time overview of supervised unsupervised semisupervised and reinforcement learning technique with realworld application supervised learning algorithm detailed discussion on supervised learning algorithm including their reliance on labeled data for training and example of application such a image recognition and natural language processing importance of labeled datasets in training algorithm and their role in various domain like autonomous vehicle and medical imaging unsupervised learning and other technique explanation of unsupervised learning algorithm used for clustering similar data point and their application in recommendation system and data analysis introduction to semisupervised learning and reinforcement learning technique emphasizing their significance in handling limited labeled data and decisionmaking task advanced learning algorithm overview of advanced learning algorithm like support vector machine decision tree knearest neighbor and neural network explanation of neural network structure function and their role in deep learning highlighting their application in various ai task and ongoing research area made with harpa ai
